title: I just want to know how a university register (confidential) give reply of an RTI made for fake degrees verification and the records found in the university? How is it possible? - Quora

response.answer_text: Simply file RTI to respective PIO With his-her name or address with your question and your question should be simple and straight. With in 30days you will be intimated by them and in case you think that the information given to you incorrect or incomplete then proceed to CIC.
